title: Parent emotional labor in supporting children's learning
description: Parent emotional labor in supporting children's learning
content:
Scenario: Parent emotional labor in supporting children's learning
    Given Sarah manages Tommy's frustration with difficult tasks
    And she builds Emma's confidence and motivation
    When the educational_elohim tracks educational emotional labor
    Then it should recognize emotional support as teaching work
    And it should value Sarah's work maintaining children's love of learning
    And emotional scaffolding should be recognized as pedagogical skill
    And the full scope of educational work should be visible
    And the system should value affective dimensions of teaching
    And parent emotional labor should be recognized as essential to learning
